mapper.sql: id, num, so2, o3, area_id, pm25, ct, primary_pollutant, co, no2, aqi, quality, pm10, o3_h8
mapper.select: select t.* from t_aqi t where t.area_id = #{areaId} order by t.ct desc limit 1

select s.areaname as name, t.aqi as value, t.ct as ct from sys_area s inner join t_aqi t on t.area_id = s.id where s.level = 2 and s.is_pm = 1 and t.ct = (select t1.ct from t_aqi t1 order by t1.ct desc limit 1)

select s.areaname,t.aqi,t.quality from sys_area s inner join t_aqi t on t.area_id = s.id where t.ct = (select ct from t_aqi order by ct desc limit 1) and s.level = 2 and s.is_pm = 1 order by t.num asc limit #{rankSize}

select s.areaname,t.aqi,t.quality from sys_area s inner join t_aqi t on t.area_id = s.id where t.ct = (select ct from t_aqi order by ct desc limit 1) and s.level = 2 and s.is_pm = 1 order by t.num desc limit #{rankSize}
select t.*,s.areaname from t_aqi t inner join sys_area s on t.area_id = s.id where s.level = 2 and s.areaname LIKE concat('%',#{cityName},'%') order by ct desc limit 1;
